title: Engine Misfire Detected
description: Random or multiple cylinder misfire detected. Engine may run rough and lose power.
recommended_action: Inspect ignition and injector performance; verify compression and air-fuel balance.

title: Low Engine Oil Pressure
description: Engine oil pressure is below safe operating threshold and can cause severe wear.
recommended_action: Stop machine if needed, verify oil level, inspect filter, pump, and oil pressure sensor.

title: Engine Coolant Overtemperature
description: Engine temperature exceeds calibrated limit and may lead to thermal damage.
recommended_action: Allow cool-down, check coolant circulation, inspect radiator blockage and fan operation.

title: 8V DC Supply Voltage Above Normal
description: Controller supply voltage is above expected operating range.
recommended_action: Check charging system, regulator behavior, harness integrity, and ECU supply lines.

title: 8V DC Supply Voltage Below Normal
description: Controller supply voltage is below expected operating range.
recommended_action: Test battery state, alternator output, grounds, and connector resistance.

title: Hydraulic Pressure Performance Alert
description: Hydraulic pressure response is outside expected range under load.
recommended_action: Inspect hydraulic fluid condition, filters, pump output, and valve response.
